${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:Strike.NAME: Strike
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Deal !D! damage to self.

${modID}:Defend.NAME: Defend
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Lose !B! Block.

${modID}:Whip.NAME: Whip
${modID}:Whip.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Increase the damage of ALL *Whips by !M! for the rest of combat.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Deal !D! damage to self. NL Increase the damage of ALL *Whips by !M! for the rest of combat.
NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Spank.NAME: Spank
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Deal !D! damage to self. NL Apply !M! ${modID}:Bleed.

${modID}:ReactiveStrike.NAME: Reactive Strike
${modID}:ReactiveStrike.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Damage value rerolled from 5 to 15 when you take damage.

${modID}:Dynamic.NAME: Dynamic
${modID}:Dynamic.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Inert. NL ${modID}:Mutable. NL Whenever you lose HP, enemy loses equal HP.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Inert. NL ${modID}:Mutable. NL Whenever enemy gains HP, you gain equal HP.
NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Bloodbath.NAME: Bloodbath
${modID}:Bloodbath.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Gain !${modID}:selfvulnerable! Vulnerable. NL Apply !M! ${modID}:Bleed to ALL enemies.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Apply !${modID}:selfvulnerable! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Bleed.

${modID}:Debauchery.NAME: Debauchery
${modID}:Debauchery.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Deal !D! damage to EVERYONE. NL Gain !M! HP.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Deal !D! damage to EVERYONE. NL Lose !M! HP.

${modID}:FinalForm.NAME: Final Form
${modID}:FinalForm.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Set HP to 1. NL Gain !M! Strength.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Heal to Max HP. NL Lose !M! Strength.

${modID}:Husk.NAME: Husk
${modID}:Husk.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Double the enemy's ${modID}:Bleed. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Lose ALL ${modID}:Bleed. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Sadism.NAME: Sadism
${modID}:Sadism.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an Attack this turn, gain !M! HP.

${modID}:Infection.NAME: Infection
${modID}:Infection.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Apply !M! Poison. NL Add a copy of this card into your discard pile.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Apply !${modID}:infectionboon! Regen. NL Add a copy of this card into your discard pile.

${modID}:Bloom.NAME: Bloom
${modID}:Bloom.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Deal !D! damage to self. NL Gain !M! Regen.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Poison.

${modID}:MassDestruction.NAME: Mass Destruction
${modID}:MassDestruction.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal damage equal to your HP.

${modID}:ToxicRecoil.NAME: Toxic Recoil
${modID}:ToxicRecoil.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you are attacked, apply !M! Poison back.

${modID}:Osmosis.NAME: Osmosis
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block. NL

${modID}:FleshyAbundance.NAME: Fleshy Abundance
${modID}:FleshyAbundance.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Gain !M! HP X times. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Lose !M! HP X times. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Laceration.NAME: Laceration
${modID}:Laceration.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an Attack deals unblocked damage, apply !M! ${modID}:Bleed.

${modID}:Polymorphism.NAME: Polymorphism
${modID}:Polymorphism.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you change ${modID}:Forms, return this from the discard pile to your hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Deal !D! damage to self. NL Whenever you change ${modID}:Forms, return this from the discard pile to your hand.

${modID}:Aftercare.NAME: Aftercare
${modID}:Aftercare.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Gain !M! HP. NL Draw 1 card.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Lose !M! HP. NL Draw 1 card.

${modID}:Ravage.NAME: Ravage
${modID}:Ravage.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Deal !D! damage to self. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.

${modID}:TenTickles.NAME: Ten Tickles
${modID}:TenTickles.DESCRIPTION: Add *Whips into your hand until it is full.

${modID}:JokesOnYou.NAME: Joke's On You
${modID}:JokesOnYou.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you take unblocked damage until next turn, gain !M! HP.

${modID}:Climax.NAME: Climax
${modID}:Climax.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Deal !D! damage !${modID}:climaxmultiplier!X times. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Deal !D! damage to self !${modID}:climaxmultiplier!X times. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:UnceasingBottom.NAME: Unceasing Bottom
${modID}:UnceasingBottom.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a copy of a card from your discard pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:UnceasingBottom.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a copy of a card from your discard pile into your hand.

${modID}:Scarhide.NAME: Scarhide
${modID}:Scarhide.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to missing HP.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL Exhaust.
NL (Gains !B! Block.)

${modID}:Bloat.NAME: Bloat
${modID}:Bloat.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Gain !B! Block. NL If in ${modID}:Molt_Form, gain !B! Block again.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Lose !B! Block. NL If in ${modID}:Molt_Form, lose !B! Block again.

${modID}:Gush.NAME: Gush
${modID}:Gush.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card{@@}{!M!|1=|@=s}.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Deal !D! damage to self. NL Draw !M! card{@@}{!M!|1=|@=s}.

${modID}:Nibble.NAME: Nibble
${modID}:Nibble.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Deal !D! damage to self. NL Gain !M! Max HP. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Lose !M! Max HP. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Edgelord.NAME: Edgelord
${modID}:Edgelord.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL If in ${modID}:Moribund_Form, gain !M! Max HP. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL If in ${modID}:Moribund_Form, Die. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Proboscis.NAME: Proboscis
${modID}:Proboscis.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Inert. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever this enemy loses HP, gain !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Needle.NAME: Needle
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Deal !D! damage to self. NL Apply !M! ${modID}:Bleed.

${modID}:Exhibitionist.NAME: Exhibitionist
${modID}:Exhibitionist.DESCRIPTION: Lose ALL Block. NL Remove ALL Block from the enemy.

${modID}:Gobble.NAME: Gobble
${modID}:Gobble.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain ${modID}:Temporary_HP equal to unblocked damage dealt.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Deal !D! damage to self. NL Gain ${modID}:Temporary_HP equal to unblocked damage dealt.

${modID}:Slurp.NAME: Slurp
${modID}:Slurp.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Regen.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Deal !D! damage to self. NL Gain !M! Poison.

${modID}:PowerBottom.NAME: Power Bottom
${modID}:PowerBottom.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Scry !M!. NL Deal damage equal to double the number of cards in your discard pile.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Discard !M! card{@@}{!M!|1=|@=s}. NL Deal damage equal to double the number of cards in your discard pile.
NL (Deals !D! damage.)

${modID}:Kiss.NAME: Kiss
${modID}:Kiss.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Gain [E] [E] NL Enemy gains !${modID}:kissgain! Strength.
${modID}:Kiss.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Gain [E] [E] [E] NL Enemy gains !${modID}:kissgain! Strength.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Lose [E] [E] NL Enemy gains !${modID}:kissgain! Strength.
${modID}:Mutable. NL Lose [E] [E] [E] NL Enemy gains !${modID}:kissgain! Strength.

${modID}:Wrigglewall.NAME: Wrigglewall
${modID}:Wrigglewall.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Malleable does not reset at the start of your turn. NL Lose !M! ${modID}:Vitality

${modID}:Amalgamate.NAME: Amalgamate
${modID}:Amalgamate.DESCRIPTION: Raise your Max HP by !M!. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:RunicTriangle.NAME: Runic Triangle
${modID}:RunicTriangle.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose HP, draw !M! card{@@}{!M!|1=|@=s}.
${modID}:RunicTriangle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you lose HP, draw !M! card{@@}{!M!|1=|@=s}.

${modID}:CoilLash.NAME: Coil Lash
${modID}:CoilLash.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you change ${modID}:Forms, add !M! *Whip{@@}{!M!|1=|@=s} into your hand.

${modID}:Rot.NAME: Rot
${modID}:Rot.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Whenever you gain HP with this card in hand, gain !M! more.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I can't play this card.

${modID}:SecondSkin.NAME: Second Skin
${modID}:SecondSkin.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Whenever you gain Block with this card in hand, gain !M! more.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I can't play this card.

${modID}:Cocoon.NAME: Cocoon
${modID}:Cocoon.DESCRIPTION: When you end your turn in ${modID}:Molt_Form, Retain your hand.

${modID}:Naughty.NAME: Naughty
${modID}:Naughty.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutate up to !${modID}:naughtymutate! card{@@}{!${modID}:naughtymutate!|1=|@=s}. NL Gain !M! HP for every ${modID}:Malignant card in your hand.

${modID}:Foreplay.NAME: Foreplay
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Lose !${modID}:foreplaymultiplier! Vigor X + !M! times.

${modID}:Cannibalism.NAME: Cannibalism
${modID}:Cannibalism.DESCRIPTION: When ${modID}:Infested cards would return to hand, they are instead played by their ${modID}:Host and sent to your Discard or Exhaust pile.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL

${modID}:DanseMacabre.NAME: Danse Macabre
${modID}:DanseMacabre.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL At the start of your turn, add !M! ${modID}:Benign *Whip{@@}{!M!|1=|@=s} into your hand. NL {@@}{!M!|1=It|@=They} Exhaust{@@}{!M!|1=s|@=}.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL
${modID}:Mutable. NL At the start of your turn, add !M! ${modID}:Malignant *Whip{@@}{!M!|1=|@=s} into your hand. NL {@@}{!M!|1=It|@=They} Exhaust{@@}{!M!|1=s|@=}.

${modID}:Metastasis.NAME: Metastasis
${modID}:Metastasis.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL The next {@@}{!M!|1=|@=!M!} card{@@}{!M!|1=|@=s} you play this turn {@@}{!M!|1=is|@=are} played twice.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Exhaust !M! card{@@}{!M!|1=|@=s}.

${modID}:Antibodies.NAME: Antibodies
${modID}:Antibodies.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! ${modID}:Temporary_Buffer.

${modID}:SynapticBurst.NAME: Synaptic Burst
${modID}:SynapticBurst.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Inert. NL ALL enemies play ALL ${modID}:Infested cards.

${modID}:Funishment.NAME: Funishment
${modID}:Funishment.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Whenever this card's ${modID}:Host plays a ${modID}:Malignant card this turn, gain !M! HP.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Whenever this card's ${modID}:Host plays a ${modID}:Malignant card this turn, heal enemy for !M! HP.

${modID}:Gestation.NAME: Gestation
${modID}:Gestation.DESCRIPTION: When you ${modID}:Infest a card, Upgrade it.

${modID}:Shapeshift.NAME: Shapeshift
${modID}:Shapeshift.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Temporary_HP. NL ${modID}:Mutate up to !${modID}:shapeshiftmutate! card{@@}{!${modID}:shapeshiftmutate!|1=|@=s}. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:IttyBitty.NAME: Itty Bitty
${modID}:IttyBitty.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${modID}:Temporary_HP. NL Costs 1 additional [E] for every 10 HP you have.

${modID}:Putrefaction.NAME: Putrefaction
${modID}:Putrefaction.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Gain ${modID}:Temporary_HP equal to the enemy's Poison{@@}{!M!|0=.|@= + !M!.}
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Gain Poison equal to the enemy's Poison{@@}{!M!|0=.|@= + !M!.}

${modID}:Proliferate.NAME: Proliferate
${modID}:Proliferate.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When this card is ${modID}:Infested, ${modID}:Infest !M! card{@@}{!M!|1=|@=s}. NL Returns to Discard pile.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I can't play this card.

${modID}:RoundTwo.NAME: Round Two
${modID}:RoundTwo.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Gain !M! HP. NL If in ${modID}:Moribund_Form, gain !${modID}:roundtwoadditional! additional HP.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Mutable. NL Lose !M! HP. NL If in ${modID}:Molt_Form, lose !${modID}:roundtwoadditional! additional HP.
